meaningMnemonic: If you point <radical>flowers</radical> in the same <radical>direction</radical> you'll be able to smell their wonderful <kanji>perfume</kanji>. The best way to get perfume out of flowers is to make them face the same way. Then the smell will go the same direction, making you smell great.
readingMnemonic: You decide to <kanji>perfume</kanji> your entire <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう) by planting flowers all the way around it, all facing in toward it.
